scripts.html: cp header.html index.html && pandoc -f markdown_github -t html5 README.md | sed 's/\\&/\&/g' >> index.html && node_modules/.bin/mjpage < index.html > tmp && mv tmp index.html
scripts.pypi: python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel && python3 setup.py sdist bdist_wheel && twine upload dist/* --skip-existing
